<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">

        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CABDomainUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Domain utilities for CAB.</description>
        <name>CABDomainUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CABDomainUtil = Class.create();
CABDomainUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function(_gr, _gs) {
		this._gr = _gr || current;
		this._gs = _gs || gs;
		this.log = new GSLog("com.snc.change_management.cab.log", this.type).setLog4J();
		
		this._domainsActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.glide.domain");
		
		if (this._domainsActive && this._gr) {
			var fqDm = GlideDomainSupport.getFullyQualifiedDomainMasterAttribute(this._gr.getTableName());
			
			if (JSUtil.notNil(fqDm))
				this._effectiveDomain = this._gr[fqDm].sys_domain;
			else if (JSUtil.notNil(this._gr.sys_domain))
				this._effectiveDomain = this._gr.sys_domain;
		}
    },

	// Check if current is in the session domain
	isInSelectedDomain: function() {
		if (!this._domainsActive)
			return true;
		return GlideDomainSupport.getCurrentDomainValueOrGlobal()+"" == this._effectiveDomain;
	},
	
	// If the record is in the global domain
	isInGlobalDomain: function() {
		if (!this._domainsActive)
			return true;
		return this._effectiveDomain == "global" || JSUtil.nil(this._effectiveDomain);
	},
	
	runInRecordsDomain: function(func) {
		if (!func || typeof func !== "function")
			return;
		
		if (!this._domainsActive || !this._effectiveDomain)
			return func();

		var currDomain = GlideDomainSupport.getCurrentDomainValueOrGlobal();
		if (currDomain != this._effectiveDomain)
			this._gs.getSession().setDomainID(this._effectiveDomain);
		
		var retVal = func();
		
		if (currDomain != this._effectiveDomain)
			this._gs.getSession().setDomainID(currDomain);
		
		return retVal;
	},
	
    type: 'CABDomainUtil'
};]]></script>
